p:
According to many scientific researches, royal jelly has been reported to stimulate cell proliferation, have antioxidant effects in vitro studies, delay ageing and strengthen the immune system. Also, it is widely used as a commercial medical product. There exist limited investigations on royal jelly. In a study conducted by Kanbur et al.
29 , it was determined that administration of fluoridine caused oxidative stress in rats and decreased SOD, CAT and GPx activities. However, administration of royal jelly with fluoridine was found to improve SOD, CAT and GPx activities.
